question: Which of the following states has announced to open wellness mohalla (ward) clinics across the state?
explanation: Punjab to get mohalla clinics, health insurance for all citizens. Government had initiated the process of providing health insurance to all the citizens so that they can get quality healthcare facilities at affordable cost. It has given an incentive of 30% marks to PCMS doctors in the National Eligibility Cum Entrance Test (NEET) for post-graduation.
